directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Market reports linked the selloff to renewed fears that the BoJ will tighten monetary policy at its meeting this week, threatening the yen...
Bitcoin slid to the $85000 level on December 15, extending its recent decline as global macro risks, leverage unwinding, and thin liquidity...
Crypto may face major volatility as the US job market weakens, pushing the Fed toward a pivotal December policy shift.
Bitcoin slipped below $85000 overnight, triggering nearly $600 million in liquidated long positions across crypto markets within 24 hours as...
Bitcoin prices pushed lower on Thursday, November 20, extending recent losses as macro variables fueled weakness in the markets.

hypothesis_content.title: Liquidation-Driven Amplification Following Breakdown
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC breaks below a key psychological support level (e.g., $85,000) on elevated volume (>1.5x 20-day average) during a NEUTRAL-to-BEAR transition, subsequent long liquidations will amplify the move, causing price to overshoot the next technical support by 3-5% before a 1-hour stabilization.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent news highlights $600M in liquidations accompanying the drop below $85k. Break of key levels triggers stop-losses and forces leveraged long positions to unwind, creating a self-reinforcing cascade. The move tends to overshoot as liquidations exhaust.
entry_conditions: BTC breaks below a round-number support (e.g., $85,000, $87,500) with volume > 1.5x 20-day avg
Estimated long liquidation heatmap shows clustered liquidity within 2% below the break level
Regime is NEUTRAL or has shifted to BEAR in the last 24 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches a level 4% below the broken support level
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price reclaims and holds above the broken support level for two consecutive 15-minute closes

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Break of key support levels fails to trigger a liquidation cascade (total liquidations < $100M in next hour) or price immediately reverses without reaching the 3% overshoot target.
